post.summary: File upload per chunks.
post.description:
n
Server implementation for Angular Flow.js library on client siten
https://github.com/flowjs/ng-flown
https://flowjs.github.io/ng-flow/n
n
n
Example of one POST request generate by flow.js on upload 51 MB filen
n
POST: http://hostname:port/api/v1/system/files/flow?flowChunkNumber=36&
flowChunkSize=1048576&flowCurrentChunkSize=1048576&flowTotalSize=53705298
&flowIdentifier=53705298-Archivzip&flowFilename=Archiv.zip&
flowRelativePath=Archiv.zip&flowTotalChunks=51n
n
Example presents upload of 36th chunk from 51 chunks.
To completion of upload this file is necessary execute 51 x POST requests
with ~1MB chunks. 
First 50 requests response with plain text "Upload"n
After upload of all 51 chunks is return plain text "All finished"n
Flow.js recognize it like complete upload and update upload status on
which can be displayed confirmation button or automatically fired
confirmation request.n
Confirmation on background move uploaded file from Temp folder to
Resources table and return list of uploaded resources
otherwise will be uploaded file deleted after expiration time from
FileChunkInfoStorage.n
After last chunk upload is necessary call one from 3 kinds of
confirmation GET request with flowIdentifier under which is stored file
in temp :n
n
- GET: files/flow/{flowIdentifier} - equals to standard upload of one
file
n
- GET: files/flow/{scope}/{category}/{flowIdentifier} - upload of one
file with
categorization resource to the scope and category n
- GET: files/zip/flow/{scope}/{category}/{flowIdentifier} - import
multiple
resources in one zip file and categorization by scope from the path and
category based on 1th level folders n.

parameters.name: flowChunkNumber
parameters.description: - chunk order number.

parameters.name: flowChunkSize
parameters.description: - size of one regular chunk, aprox. 1MB.

parameters.name: flowCurrentChunkSize
parameters.description: - current chunk size, last chunk can be smaller.

parameters.name: flowTotalSize
parameters.description: - total size of uploaded file.

parameters.name: flowIdentifier
parameters.description: - unique id for upload, flow.js compose id from file size and filename.

parameters.name: flowFilename
parameters.description: - uploaded filename.

parameters.name: flowRelativePath
parameters.description: - relative path.

parameters.name: flowTotalChunks
parameters.description: - to how much chunks is divided file.

get.summary: Creates new file in Resources n Require role ROLE_APP_CREATOR | ROLE_MDM_EDITOR | ROLE_SETTING_CREATOR n Confirmation copy uploaded file from Temp folder on Server to. Resource table and return new resource n n GET: http://hostname:port/api/v1/system/files/flow/53705298-Archivzip? getNonpagedCount=true&limit=30&offset=0.

parameters.name: flowIdentifier
parameters.description: - id of flow upload process.

get.summary: Create new file in Resource with scope and category n Require role ROLE_APP_CREATOR | ROLE_MDM_EDITOR | ROLE_SETTING_CREATOR n Confirmation copy uploaded file from Temp folder on Server to. Resource table and return new resource n n GET: http://hostname:port/api/v1/system/files/flow/scope/images/53705298- Archivzip?getNonpagedCount=true&limit=30&offset=0.

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: - association of resource to application, project or organization scope.

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: - custom categorization of resources inside scope.

parameters.name: flowIdentifier
parameters.description: - id of flow upload process.

get.summary: Import resources from zip file.
get.description:
n
Require role ROLE_APP_CREATOR | ROLE_MDM_EDITOR | ROLE_SETTING_CREATOR
n
Confirmation here means copy uploaded file in temp folder on Server to. 
Resource table and return list of new resources
Extract resources from complete uploaded zip file in temp to resource
table
n
n
GET: http://hostname:port/api/v1/system/files/zip/flow/scope/images/
53705298-
Archivzip?getNonpagedCount=true&limit=30&offset=0
n
ZIP archive is parsed by next rules
n
- files from root directory are stored under scope and default category
from the URL path
n
- files from first level folders apply folder name like new category
name. USe normalized folder names without whitespaces !!!
n
- files from folders on level 2 and high will apply like category parent

get.summary: requests location and credentials for directly accessing the MQTT broker from the calling client.
get.description:
This is called by the IoT MeshGateway after enrollment. Since sensitive information is transported, calling this
method requires HTTPS!

Notice, for keeping the client certificate safe, native MQTT is supported only when called
from enrolled devices using device key authentication.

parameters.name: clientId
parameters.description: as an aid. This should be provided and set when known only. The value is a suggestion only, that neither the client nor the server need to follow.

parameters.name: protocol
parameters.description: of choice. Typically, devices use native MQTT while client apps request. MQTT_OVER_WEBSOCKET. When not given explicitly, the server makes a reasonable choice depending on whether the request originates an enrolled device.
